javadoc:
Node object for managing one or more components. If more that one managed component
 is active, then this node will create a tabbedPane object to contain the active components.

methods.javadoc:
Constructs a new component node with the given docking windows manager.
@param mgr the docking windows manager that this node belongs to.
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a new component node with the given docking windows manager.

params.name: mgr
params.comment: the docking windows manager that this node belongs to.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a new component node from the given xml element.

params.name: elem
params.comment: the xml element describing the configuration of this node.

params.name: parent
params.comment: the parent node for this node.

params.name: restoredPlaceholders
params.comment: the list into which any restored placeholders will be placed

methods.javadoc:
Adds a component to this node.
@param placeholder the component placeholder containing the component to be added.
methods.name: add
methods.comment: Adds a component to this node.

params.name: placeholder
params.comment: the component placeholder containing the component to be added.

methods.name: remove
methods.comment:
Removes the component from this node, but not from the manager. Used when
 the component is moved.  If component is active, it will remain active.

params.name: placeholder
params.comment: the object containing the component to be removed.

methods.name: remove
methods.comment:
Removes the component from this node (and the manager), but possibly keeps an empty object as
 a placeholder.

params.name: placeholder
params.comment: the placeholder object to be removed.

params.name: keepEmptyPlaceholder
params.comment: flag indicating to keep a placeholder placeholder object.

methods.name: split
methods.comment:
Replaces this node in its parent with a new split node that contains this node as one
 child and a new componentNode containing the source placeholders as the other child.

params.name: source
params.comment: the placeholder to share the current space with.

params.name: dropCode
params.comment: int value specifying the split order and orientation.

methods.javadoc:
Returns true if there are currently more than one active component in this node.
@return true if there are currently more than one active component in this node.
methods.name: isStacked
methods.comment: Returns true if there are currently more than one active component in this node.

return.comment: true if there are currently more than one active component in this node.

methods.javadoc:
Makes the component the selected tab.
@param placeholder the component placeholder object of the component to be shown in the active tab.
methods.name: makeSelectedTab
methods.comment: Makes the component the selected tab.

params.name: placeholder
params.comment: the component placeholder object of the component to be shown in the active tab.

name: ComponentNode
comment:
Node object for managing one or more components. If more that one managed component
 is active, then this node will create a tabbedPane object to contain the active components.
